name: Agricultural Apps Inc.
description: Developer of a field platform intended to offer proper agricultural management. The company's platform specializes in recording activities in an efficient and orderly manner with the ability to deliver financial and agricultural reports, enabling agricultural businesses to make informed decisions regarding crops, workers, labor, supplies, and machinery.
one_liner: Developer of a field platform intended to offer proper agricultural management. The company's platform specializes in recording activities in an efficient and orderly manner with the ability to deliver financial and agricultural reports, enabling agricultural businesses to make informed decisions regarding crops, workers, labor, supplies, and machinery.

name: Agromatch LLC
description: Developer of an online rental platform designed for farmers to buy new or used agricultural machinery. The company's platform offers competitive prices on all of its machinery rentals and sales including tractors, harvesters and planters, enabling agricultural industry to get the machinery they need with machinery maintenance.
one_liner: Developer of an online rental platform designed for farmers to buy new or used agricultural machinery. The company's platform offers competitive prices on all of its machinery rentals and sales including tractors, harvesters and planters, enabling agricultural industry to get the machinery they need with machinery maintenance.

name: Braintree Technologies Sdn. Bhd.
description: Provider of drone services intended to bring precision and automation to agriculture. The company provides drone services and AI-powered computer vision algorithms and technologies in mapping, evaluation, design & planning, database development, and analysis for agricultural entities, enabling the agricultural industry to process satellite remote sensing data for searching new suitable land for plantation.
one_liner: Provider of drone services intended to bring precision and automation to agriculture. The company provides drone services and AI-powered computer vision algorithms and technologies in mapping, evaluation, design & planning, database development, and analysis for agricultural entities, enabling the agricultural industry to process satellite remote sensing data for searching new suitable land for plantation.

name: Chickin Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of agro-technology application designed to solve challenges faced by local farmers. The company's platform allows farmers to input data, including daily, sales and production data, to enhance performance and make it more measurable and at the same time, minimize risks through preventive measures, enabling farmers in the management of the poultry farm, data, IoT configuration adaptable to climate, temperature and humidity as well as recording the age of each poultry.
one_liner: Developer of agro-technology application designed to solve challenges faced by local farmers. The company's platform allows farmers to input data, including daily, sales and production data, to enhance performance and make it more measurable and at the same time, minimize risks through preventive measures, enabling farmers in the management of the poultry farm, data, IoT configuration adaptable to climate, temperature and humidity as well as recording the age of each poultry.

name: Earthgen Technology Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of drones designed for agriculture in Taiwan. The company focuses on drones technology which can be applied in farming, such as manual sraying of pesticides, enabling farmers to improve efficiency.
one_liner: Developer of drones designed for agriculture in Taiwan. The company focuses on drones technology which can be applied in farming, such as manual sraying of pesticides, enabling farmers to improve efficiency.

name: eFishery Pte Ltd
description: Operator of an Internet of Things-based aquaculture company intended to serve fish and shrimp farmers to reduce social and economic inequalities. The company offers an automatic fish feeder for commercial aquaculture that uses motion sensors to measure fish appetite and feed amounts and also provides integrated services, starting from farming operations, and financing to distribution, enabling fish farmers to increase productivity and profits in fish and shrimp farming.
one_liner: Operator of an Internet of Things-based aquaculture company intended to serve fish and shrimp farmers to reduce social and economic inequalities. The company offers an automatic fish feeder for commercial aquaculture that uses motion sensors to measure fish appetite and feed amounts and also provides integrated services, starting from farming operations, and financing to distribution, enabling fish farmers to increase productivity and profits in fish and shrimp farming.

name: PT Ekomoditi Solutions Indonesia
description: Developer of a plantation management software designed to increase the palm oil plantation. The company's software helps to simplify the record of plantation management, improve efficiency, reduce cost, increase productivity and monitor some aspects of the problems that have the potential to cause losses, enabling farmers to access information about different phases of the plantation.
one_liner: Developer of a plantation management software designed to increase the palm oil plantation. The company's software helps to simplify the record of plantation management, improve efficiency, reduce cost, increase productivity and monitor some aspects of the problems that have the potential to cause losses, enabling farmers to access information about different phases of the plantation.

name: Elevarm Technologies Pte Ltd
description: Developer of an agricultural trading platform designed to offer sustainable agriculture assistance. The company's product offers the digitization of farmlands and provides supply services that also focus on the upstream side of farming, enabling business customers and farmers to maximize production and revenue.
one_liner: Developer of an agricultural trading platform designed to offer sustainable agriculture assistance. The company's product offers the digitization of farmlands and provides supply services that also focus on the upstream side of farming, enabling business customers and farmers to maximize production and revenue.

name: EZ Farming, Inc.
description: Operator of a farm acceleration digital platform intended to offer agricultural investment opportunities connecting small farmers with industrial investors. The company's platform seeks to pull investments from within the continent and the Diaspora to transform small farms into commercial sizes and empower youths in agriculture by equipping the next generation of farmers, enabling smallholder farmers to finance their businesses fast and find produce buyers.
one_liner: Operator of a farm acceleration digital platform intended to offer agricultural investment opportunities connecting small farmers with industrial investors. The company's platform seeks to pull investments from within the continent and the Diaspora to transform small farms into commercial sizes and empower youths in agriculture by equipping the next generation of farmers, enabling smallholder farmers to finance their businesses fast and find produce buyers.

name: FarMart Service Private Limited
description: Developer of food supply platform designed to connect farmers and share farm-related information easily. The company's platform connects farmers with retailers and food businesses and helps in sourcing farm produce at competitive prices, enabling farmers to sell their products easily.
one_liner: Developer of food supply platform designed to connect farmers and share farm-related information easily. The company's platform connects farmers with retailers and food businesses and helps in sourcing farm produce at competitive prices, enabling farmers to sell their products easily.

name: HeavyConnect, Inc.
description: Developer of a compliance software platform designed to help food and agricultural businesses meet regulatory requirements. The company's platform offers cloud-based farm management tools that have a variety of features, including checklists, SOPs and training modules for operating farming tasks, enabling farmers to track farming machines and work schedules.
one_liner: Developer of a compliance software platform designed to help food and agricultural businesses meet regulatory requirements. The company's platform offers cloud-based farm management tools that have a variety of features, including checklists, SOPs and training modules for operating farming tasks, enabling farmers to track farming machines and work schedules.

name: Hydroleap Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of wastewater treatment technology designed to replace expensive chemical treatments with a smart electrical treatment for wastewater. The company's technology focuses on the treatment of high-suspended solid, high oil, and heavy metal-contaminated wastewater, enabling clients to receive water recycling services using electrical and membrane treatment systems.
one_liner: Developer of wastewater treatment technology designed to replace expensive chemical treatments with a smart electrical treatment for wastewater. The company's technology focuses on the treatment of high-suspended solid, high oil, and heavy metal-contaminated wastewater, enabling clients to receive water recycling services using electrical and membrane treatment systems.

name: iChase Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of an artificial intelligence poultry health monitoring system designed to provide poultry physiological monitoring and disease prevention. The company's system is a remote monitoring system using computer vision, guided laser beams, an electronic weighing machine and control software built on machine learning, enabling farmers to boost productivity by monitoring poultry birds' health and maturity.
one_liner: Developer of an artificial intelligence poultry health monitoring system designed to provide poultry physiological monitoring and disease prevention. The company's system is a remote monitoring system using computer vision, guided laser beams, an electronic weighing machine and control software built on machine learning, enabling farmers to boost productivity by monitoring poultry birds' health and maturity.

name: Jala Tech Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a multi-sensor technology designed to monitor water conditions and increase the productivity and efficiency of shrimp farms. The company's technology provides water quality monitoring, planning, and reporting tools complete with a decision support system based on data that has been collected and analyzed, enabling farmers to monitor and adjust their treatments and techniques to ensure a healthy and bountiful pond.
one_liner: Developer of a multi-sensor technology designed to monitor water conditions and increase the productivity and efficiency of shrimp farms. The company's technology provides water quality monitoring, planning, and reporting tools complete with a decision support system based on data that has been collected and analyzed, enabling farmers to monitor and adjust their treatments and techniques to ensure a healthy and bountiful pond.

name: Orbicle Bio
description: Developer of next-generation biofertilizers specifically designed for rice farming. Their biofertilizer leverages methanotrophs and methylotrophs to convert methane emissions into plant growth stimulants, addressing both environmental and agronomic challenges.
one_liner: Developer of next-generation biofertilizers specifically designed for rice farming. Their biofertilizer leverages methanotrophs and methylotrophs to convert methane emissions into plant growth stimulants, addressing both environmental and agronomic challenges.

name: Plant Cartridge Sdn. Bhd.
description: Operator of an agriculture technology company intended to offer sustainable micro-urban farming systems. The company's growing kit consists of a box of cartridges that contain selected seeds and the growing medium and a rectangular ultraviolet-coated polyethylene tank, with a hole in the center for topping up the water for the plants and holes to hold the pods in place, enabling people to grow their own food at home in order to solve the global food production shortage.
one_liner: Operator of an agriculture technology company intended to offer sustainable micro-urban farming systems. The company's growing kit consists of a box of cartridges that contain selected seeds and the growing medium and a rectangular ultraviolet-coated polyethylene tank, with a hole in the center for topping up the water for the plants and holes to hold the pods in place, enabling people to grow their own food at home in order to solve the global food production shortage.

name: Plantner Inc.
description: Producer of organic fertilizers using technology that extracts plant growth hormones and other beneficial compounds such as alginic acids, amino acids, and phytic acids from ocean byproducts like algae. By harnessing these natural substances from otherwise discarded materials, the company not only maximizes the value of these byproducts but also contributes to the production of environmentally friendly fertilizers.
one_liner: Producer of organic fertilizers using technology that extracts plant growth hormones and other beneficial compounds such as alginic acids, amino acids, and phytic acids from ocean byproducts like algae. By harnessing these natural substances from otherwise discarded materials, the company not only maximizes the value of these byproducts but also contributes to the production of environmentally friendly fertilizers.

name: ABU ERDAN DMCC
description: An end-to-end SaaS poultry management cloud solution that empowers poultry companies to maximize production, increase efficiency, and reduce waste.
one_liner: An end-to-end SaaS poultry management cloud solution that empowers poultry companies to maximize production, increase efficiency, and reduce waste.

name: Qarbotech Sdn Bhd
description: Developer of a biocompatible technology designed to increase the photosynthesis rate in plants. The company's product is formulated with a particular organic compound that has similar properties as chlorophyll converts more photons delivers more electrons to the photo-systems and enhances the photosynthesis rate of plants by a certain margin, enabling farmers to enhance plant growth and avoid excessive chemical fertilizer usage.
one_liner: Developer of a biocompatible technology designed to increase the photosynthesis rate in plants. The company's product is formulated with a particular organic compound that has similar properties as chlorophyll converts more photons delivers more electrons to the photo-systems and enhances the photosynthesis rate of plants by a certain margin, enabling farmers to enhance plant growth and avoid excessive chemical fertilizer usage.

name: Seamorny Holdings Pte. Ltd.
description: The company is currently operating in Stealth mode.
one_liner: The company is currently operating in Stealth mode.

name: Sioma LLC
description: Developer of a precision agriculture system designed to help farmers increase their productivity. The company's system helps to know and increase the area traveled by workers in the field, and helps to carry the inventory of bunches automatically, offers an integrated control system that allows organizing the exact boxes that are going to export in such a way that they are not overweight, enabling users to improve the internal processes of their crops.
one_liner: Developer of a precision agriculture system designed to help farmers increase their productivity. The company's system helps to know and increase the area traveled by workers in the field, and helps to carry the inventory of bunches automatically, offers an integrated control system that allows organizing the exact boxes that are going to export in such a way that they are not overweight, enabling users to improve the internal processes of their crops.

name: Stellapps Technologies Private Limited
description: Operator of a dairy technology company intended to improve productivity, and quality and ensure end-to-end traceability across the dairy supply chain. The company's technology leverages advanced analytics and artificial intelligence through its full-stack IoT platform leading to dairy ecosystem partnerships with financial and insurance institutions, veterinary services, and cattle nutrition providers, enabling clients to create significant value for each stakeholder including smallholder farmers.
one_liner: Operator of a dairy technology company intended to improve productivity, and quality and ensure end-to-end traceability across the dairy supply chain. The company's technology leverages advanced analytics and artificial intelligence through its full-stack IoT platform leading to dairy ecosystem partnerships with financial and insurance institutions, veterinary services, and cattle nutrition providers, enabling clients to create significant value for each stakeholder including smallholder farmers.

name: WeGrow asia CO., LTD.
description: Developer of an AI-powered greenhouse cultivation management platform designed for developing IoT sensing and control systems. The company offers necessary planting data, technical labor and sales channels, enabling young farmers to get interest in agriculture.
one_liner: Developer of an AI-powered greenhouse cultivation management platform designed for developing IoT sensing and control systems. The company offers necessary planting data, technical labor and sales channels, enabling young farmers to get interest in agriculture.

name: Farmeron, Inc.
description: Provider of a cloud-based farm business management and analytics platform. The company provides a platform designed to help dairy and cattle producers manage their business operations while assisting in decision making process.
one_liner: Provider of a cloud-based farm business management and analytics platform. The company provides a platform designed to help dairy and cattle producers manage their business operations while assisting in decision making process.

name: Local Bushel, Co.
description: Developer of an e-commerce platform designed to deliver high-quality, harvested to order ingredients from local and sustainable farms to the end users. The company's e-commerce platform deliver high-quality, harvested fruits and vegetables from local and sustainable farms, enabling consumers to avail fresh quality foods with a reliable delivery option.
one_liner: Developer of an e-commerce platform designed to deliver high-quality, harvested to order ingredients from local and sustainable farms to the end users. The company's e-commerce platform deliver high-quality, harvested fruits and vegetables from local and sustainable farms, enabling consumers to avail fresh quality foods with a reliable delivery option.

name: PT iGrow Resources Indonesia
description: Provider of an online agricultural management platform intended to help farmers to produce high quality organic food. The company's platform connects sponsors, farmers, land owners and crop buyers, enabling farmers to stay updated easily.
one_liner: Provider of an online agricultural management platform intended to help farmers to produce high quality organic food. The company's platform connects sponsors, farmers, land owners and crop buyers, enabling farmers to stay updated easily.

name: OnFarm Systems, Inc.
description: Developer of an agriculture management software designed to integrate data into a customizable dashboard with forecasts and recommendations. The company's software offers a data management platform that collates statistics about the weather conditions, irrigation and soil moisture data from the sensors to map fields to optimize the costs for irrigation, enabling farmers to make better and more informed decisions resulting in immediate impact on farm inputs, productivity and profitability.
one_liner: Developer of an agriculture management software designed to integrate data into a customizable dashboard with forecasts and recommendations. The company's software offers a data management platform that collates statistics about the weather conditions, irrigation and soil moisture data from the sensors to map fields to optimize the costs for irrigation, enabling farmers to make better and more informed decisions resulting in immediate impact on farm inputs, productivity and profitability.
